alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Greene; Madison; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:41AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Polk, eastern Greene, western Story, central Madison, southeastern Webster, Boone, southern Hamilton, Dallas and northwestern Warren Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 740 AM CDT, emergency management reported a strong thunderstorm over Adel, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to dime size hail and additional rainfall up to one half inch. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Urbandale and Grimes around 750 AM CDT. Granger around 755 AM CDT. Polk City, Woodward, Big Creek Lake and Saylorville Lake around 800 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Madrid, Slater, Iowa State Center, Ames, Gilbert, Story City and Roland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 54 and 72, near mile marker 105, and between mile markers 107 and 128. Interstate 80 between mile markers 102 and 133. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
